# kABStringPropertyType

**Global Variable**

String property. Returned as a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFString] object.

## Declaration

```swift
var kABStringPropertyType: Int { get }
```

## Constants

- **kABInvalidPropertyType**: Invalid property.
- **kABIntegerPropertyType**: Integer property. Returned as a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumber] object.
- **kABRealPropertyType**: Real property.
- **kABDateTimePropertyType**: Date-time property.
- **kABDictionaryPropertyType**: Dictionary property. Returned as a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFDictionary] object.
- **kABMultiStringPropertyType**: Multistring property.
- **kABMultiIntegerPropertyType**: Multiinteger property. Returned as an [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABMultiValueRef] of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumber] objects.
- **kABMultiRealPropertyType**: Multireal property.
- **kABMultiDateTimePropertyType**: Multi–date-time property. Returned as an [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABMultiValueRef] of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFDate] objects.
- **kABMultiDictionaryPropertyType**: Multidictionary property. Returned as an [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABMultiValueRef] of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFDictionary] objects.
